full_summary:
**Liquid Chromatography – Tandem Mass Spectrometer (LCMS-MS) System**
=============================================
**Contract Reference**: WS4288845645-Doc4294505116
**Solicitation Number**: WS4288845645

**Request for Proposal Background**
-------------------------------

The Department of Health has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a Liquid Chromatography – Tandem Mass Spectrometer (LCMS-MS) system. The proposed system will be installed in the Exposure and Biomonitoring Division at Health Canada to support high-throughput screening activities.

**Key System Requirements**
---------------------------

*   The proposed system must be capable of high-throughput screening.
*   It should have sufficient sensitivity and be able to detect a wide range of compounds.  (*supplemental with specification source*).
*   The system's lifespan and limit of repair should not be an issue (*provided these are automobile life expectancers!).
*   Delivery to Ottawa, Ontario must be completed by March 15, 2024.

**Procurement Details**
--------------------

*   **Public Tender Notice**: Solicitation Number: WS4288845645
*   **Publication Date**: November 22, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: December 13, 2023, at 14:00 EST.  Any bids submitted after this date/time will be deemed non-conformative.
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 11, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

**Selection Criteria**
-------------------

Bidders must meet mandatory requirements detailed in the RFP.  The award of the contract will be based on a lowest price bid.

[Please find the notice document](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18082532?extsite=MTgwODI1MzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for additional information.
